#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    long int n;
    cin>>n;
    long int l = sqrt(n);
    long int d = 0;
    long int sum = 1;
    for (long int i = 2; i <= l; i++) {
        if (n % i == 0) {
            sum += i;
            d = n / i;
            if (d != i) {
                sum += d;
            }
        }
    }
    cout<<sum<<endl;
}
